short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picks a random avatar from vrmodels.store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "The 'VRModels Random Avatar Picker' extension is designed to enhance your browsing experience. With a simple click, it selects a random avatar from the VRModels website and redirects you to that avatar's page. It adds an element of surprise and fun to your exploration of avatar content, allowing you to discover new and exciting avatars effortlessly."
